name: EndorseUPMotivationalPositiveAffirmations
0:
”Alexa ask endorse up affirmation to endorse me”
”Alexa, ask endorse up affirmation to play endorsement lesson”
”Alexa, open endorse up affirmation”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: endorse up affirmation
des:
We all like to be encouraged and praised, but why do we rely on external forces to govern our happiness? Take control of your happiness and self-esteem. Play positive affirmations and endorse yourself to your hearts content. Studies have shown that the happiest people are the ones that are able to project positive self worth regardless of circumstance or surrounding. Tap into the positivity of other users and consume the public endorsements that they have shared.

To play an endorsement you can say: "play endorsement" or "endorse me".
To play a self endorsement lesson you can say: "play endorsement lesson" or "self endorsement learning"
You can navigate through endorsements or lessons by saying "next" or "previous".

You are a hot sketch and you deserve the best in life!

Your feedback is welcome and future enhancements will prioritize popular requests.

Upcoming changes:
- Account linking with Android EndorseUP app to allow users to record/play personal endorsement and build a list of favorite endorsements.

- Adding a learning module similar to the EndorseUP app which will play lessons that teach you the power of endorsements and how to get the most out of them.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
